content: Dear Blue, I am deeply concerned about the recent cyber attack on your military bases near Green's borders. As a gesture of goodwill, I offer my assistance in investigating the attack and share any intelligence I have on potential threats to your critical infrastructure. Together, we can ensure the security and stability of our nations. Please let me know how I can be of help. Best regards, Red
